title: Animals of Australia
creator_credit: Educational Media Australia and Ken J. Widdowson
brief_description: An overview of Australian animals, grouped according to their natural habitat - the dry inland, open forests, rain forests and coastal areas. Both well known and lesser known animals are seen. Elementary descriptive treatment. Suitable for primary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Educational Media Australia and Ken J. Widdowson
